PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09112019-06-22,  FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (2017 Livestock Deferral)
PrecisRegulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (2017 LIVESTOCK DEFERRAL) in order to implement Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's advice as to which regions should be prescribed regions on the basis that they have experienced drought or excess moisture conditions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0247 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (2017 Livestock Deferral)
precis: Regulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (2017 LIVESTOCK DEFERRAL) in order to implement Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's advice as to which regions should be prescribed regions on the basis that they have experienced drought or excess moisture conditions.
